寙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǔ］
［《集韻》勇主切，上噳，以。］
懒惰。

寙字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　寙； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页289第30
【集韻】【韻會】?勇主切，音庾。嬾也。【史記·貨殖列傳】啙寙偸生。承慶云：嬾人不能自起，如瓜瓠在地不自立，故字从㼌。又常在室中，故从宀。　【正字通】窳字之譌文。◎按《玉篇》《類篇》窳，兪矩切。註：邪也，器空中也。引《說文》污窬，俱載穴部。《韻會》七麌收寙，註本司馬氏《類篇》勇主切，嬾也。與窳音義各別，應分爲二。

寙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
寙字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 1] [Liu Zi Department] 　寙; Kangxi strokes: 13; page number: page 289 30
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Brave Lord Cuts, Sound Yu. Lazy too. 【Historical Records · Biographies of Goods Reproduction】Whhhhhhhhhhhhhhh. Cheng Qingyun: Lazy people can’t stand up on their own. Often in the room, so Cong Luo.　【Zhengzitong】Zhaowen with typographic characters. ◎According to "Jade Pian" and "Like Pian", cut it in right order. Note: Evil is also in the air. Quoting "Suowen" dirty 窬, all contains the acupoints. "Rhyme Meeting" seven 麌麌寙, note that Sima's "Like Pian" is brave and lazy. Separately from the melody, it should be divided into two.
